commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: They all went in here.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Here?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: This is where we just came from. Maybe they're going to the aquarium too?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Or maybe the planetarium.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hanayo's with them, so maybe they're going to the amusement park, since that's where all the food is.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Are we going to keep following them?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We've already come this far! Nobody's going home 'til we figure out what the heck is going on!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We'll get busted if you two keep arguing.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Oh, shoot. This is NOT good. C'mon Shizuko, quit dawdling and get over here!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Why are you so into this...?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Is that...

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: ...a school idol live show? In a place like this?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Maybe they came here to see it?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Oh, they're over there.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Huh? Where?

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: This is totally amazing! I love this song!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Kayo-chin! I love this song too!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yeah, it's not bad at all. Their leader's got a super bright future ahead of her!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I've only seen them live once and I'm already a fan!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Uh-huh! Me too!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I'm glad you wound up liking them.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: This is your first time seeing them too, right? How'd you find out about them?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Just basic networking, my friends.

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Networking?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: It means I have people who share any school idol news they find with me. We exchange info about the latest up-and-coming groups.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: I like to keep up to date with the latest gossip and stuff too, but I'd never heard of this group!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Wow, you two are total school idol maniacs, huh?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: You're JUST now realizing this? I wouldn't be a school idol if I didn't love them!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: You like them too, don't you, Rin?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Well yeah, but what do you need all this detailed info or whatever for?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Seriously? We need it so we can cheer them on! They're working their butts off, so it's only right!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Yeah, exactly! It makes you really happy when people come to cheer you on too, doesn't it, Rin?

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: You bet it does!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Well, then you've gotta treat others the way you wanna be treated!

commands.speaker: Rin
commands.line: Got it! You guys rock! Woo!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Besides, there's only so much you can do on your own. You gotta soak in all the good parts of other school idols too.

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Will do! I gotta learn a whole bunch from everyone!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yeah! That's the spirit!

commands.speaker: Hanayo
commands.line: Wooooooooooo!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: So they're all here to cheer on other school idols.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: They look like genuine fans.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: You can totally tell how much they love school idols.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: They don't just look after themselves, but they look after other school idols too... No wonder μ's is so incredible.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: We need to learn from them. Rina-chan Board says, "Let's do this!"

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Yeah, that's right! You said it, Rinako!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: We're all here now, so we should enjoy the live show as well!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Totally!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Nico!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Gah! What the heck are you three doing here?!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: We just happened to see you so we followed you here.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Um... Would you mind if we joined you?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I don't even know where this is all coming from, but...a live show is way more fun when everyone's livin' it up. Okay, girls, let's get loud!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!
